Articles.Content:
Hello, friends.

Telemetry is used in realworld spacecraft control, yes, I know this. So, can someone explain me, what mods, like Telemachus, actually do in KSP? All that I could understand - they generate some kind of telenetry... and nothing else?

Can I actually send some data, like code packges with control programms for kOS, or something like that?

Here are a couple of projects that allow you to send commands to your vessels:

Kerminal: Terminal Interface to KSP via Telemachus"]Kerminal - Terminal interface to KSP

kRPC - Python interface to KSP

pyKSP - Another Python interface to KSP
